title: New World’s Rocky Start - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.28.21
description:
Greg and Gary Whitta talk about the success and Day 1 struggles of New World, Activision/Blizzard's settlement, and Donkey Kong coming to Super Nintendo World.

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:08:30 - Housekeeping
I got to interview Will Wright about his new game! kindafunny.com/willwright
McDonald’s Ultimate item
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: The Kinda Funny Destiny 2 PC Clan & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:10:35 - New World’s Rocky Start, Cameron Koch @ GameSpot
00:34:00 - Ad
00:38:48 - Blizzard Settles US Equal Opportunity Commission Lawsuit, Kat Bailey @ IGN
00:44:40 - Twitch about to Verify Chatters, Ari Notis @ Kotaku
00:51:30 - Outriders Dev expands to work on smaller games, Brendan Sinclair @ GIB
00:54:45 - Super Nintendo World adding Donkey Kong Area in 2024
00:58:30 - Out today
01:05:35 - Squad Up:Borzen00(All of them) - https://discord.gg/
turbotaxinsapceww
01:06:45 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Mike
